properties.description: Spacious 3-Bedroom Family Home with Ample Parking in Prime Salisbury East Location. A well-maintained home offering comfort, convenience, and plenty of space for the whole family. This charming property features three generous bedrooms with natural light, a functional kitchen with ample storage and workspace, and a comfortable living area perfect for family relaxation. The standout feature is the large yard with space for up to 7 cars, ideal for extra vehicles, a boat, or a trailer.
